name: Gregory Baltoro 85 Backpack - Men's
description: When a weekend just isn’t enough, the refined suspension system on the Baltoro 85 makes it an extremely comfortable, high-capacity pack. The Response A3 (Automatic Angle Adjust) chassis adjusts the shoulder harness and hipbelt panels independently to accommodate the changing angles of your body, allowing you to keep your balance and maintain your centre of gravity as you cover varying terrain. Highly water-resistant hipbelt pockets protect your electronics from wet bushes and branches, and an included raincover keeps everything dry if (or rather, when) it rains heavily. Once you reach your destination, the hydration sleeve doubles as an ultralight daypack for ridge runs and summit missions.7075 aluminum wire frame is wishbone-shaped to channel the load to the centre and lumbar regions.Special anti-barrelling stays ensure stability with big loads.Removable foam shim lets you customize the lower back contour.Top, front and bottom access.Bottom sleeping bag compartment has a removable internal divider.Twin water-bottle holsters are canted for easy access and stow away when not needed.Lots of pockets on the front, sides and lid keep you organized.Internal hydration reservoir sleeve detaches to become an ultralight daypack with a drawstring closure, zippered external pocket, daisy chains and mesh shoulder straps.Removable shockcord loops for ice axes or trekking poles.Removable, adjustable straps let you attach a sleeping pad or extra gear.Maximum recommended cargo weight: 27kg.
